data.comment: The first-half is under way at Giuseppe Meazza - Hellas Verona kick-off to start the match.
Corner awarded to Milan.
In the minute 2, Milan are pushing forward but Zlatan Ibrahimovic's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Hellas Verona at Giuseppe Meazza.
Giangiacomo Magnani (Hellas Verona) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 4, Marco Guida signals a free kick to Milan in their own half.
Hellas Verona have been awarded a corner by Marco Guida.
Throw-in for Milan close to the penalty box.
In the minute 5, Nikola Kalinic gets his shot on target but fails to score for Hellas Verona.
Federico Ceccherini (Hellas Verona) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
Antonin Barak scores to make it 0-1 at Giuseppe Meazza.
In the minute 7, Throw-in Milan.
Hellas Verona awarded a free kick in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Milan.
In the minute 8, Milan's Alexis Saelemaekers gets in a shot on goal at Giuseppe Meazza. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Milan.
Hellas Verona needs to be cautious. Milan have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 10, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in high up the field for Hellas Verona in Milan.
Ball goes out of play for a Hellas Verona goal kick.
In the minute 14, Free kick for Milan in their own half.
Milan have been awarded a corner by Marco Guida.
Milan's Hakan Calhanoglu misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 16, Hellas Verona have a goal kick.
Free kick Milan.
Marco Guida signals a free kick to Hellas Verona just outside Milan's area.
In the minute 19, Hellas Verona take a comfortable 0-2 lead thanks to Davide Calabria.
In Milan a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Milan awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 23, Milan's Rafael Leao is on target but unsuccessful.
Milan have been awarded a corner by Marco Guida.
Milan attack but Matteo Gabbia's header doesn't find the target.
In the minute 24, Marco Guida awards Hellas Verona a goal kick.
Can Milan capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Hellas Verona have a goal kick.
In the minute 26, Rafael Leao of Milan gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Hellas Verona at Giuseppe Meazza.
Milan drive forward but Zlatan Ibrahimovic is judged offside.
In the minute 27, Goal! Giangiacomo Magnani pulls one back for Milan to make it 1-2.
Marco Guida signals a free kick to Milan in their own half.
Marco Guida signals a free kick to Milan.
In the minute 29, Ball goes out of play for a Hellas Verona goal kick.
Theo Hernandez for Milan drives towards goal at Giuseppe Meazza. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Milan.
In the minute 31, Milan to take a throw-in in Hellas Verona territory.
Zlatan Ibrahimovic of Milan is pulled up for offside.
Marco Guida awards Milan a goal kick.
In the minute 33, Milan are in shooting range from this free kick.
Federico Ceccherini (Hellas Verona) has received a first yellow card.
In Milan, Simon Kjaer (Milan) misses the target with a header.
In the minute 34, It's a goal kick for the away team in Milan.
Milan push forward at Giuseppe Meazza and Zlatan Ibrahimovic gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Hellas Verona defence.
Milan have been awarded a corner by Marco Guida.
In the minute 36, Corner awarded to Milan.
Hellas Verona awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Hellas Verona in their own half.
In the minute 37, Throw-in for Hellas Verona in their own half.
Free kick for Hellas Verona in the half of Milan.
Throw-in for Hellas Verona in the half of Milan.
In the minute 40, Free kick for Milan in their own half.
In Milan a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Hellas Verona's Matteo Lovato has been booked in Milan.
In the minute 43, Milan are coming forward and Zlatan Ibrahimovic gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Hellas Verona at Giuseppe Meazza.
Milan awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 44, Marco Guida signals a free kick to Hellas Verona in their own half.
In Milan, Hakan Calhanoglu of Milan is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Corner awarded to Milan.
In the minute 45, Milan's Simon Kjaer attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Hellas Verona have a goal kick.
The first-half has come to a close in Milan.
In the minute 46, Milan kick-off the second-half u- the match is underway again!
Milan make their first substitution with Ante Rebic replacing Alexis Saelemaekers.
Free kick for Hellas Verona in their own half.
In the minute 48, Marco Guida awards the away team a throw-in.
Ball safe as Milan is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Milan awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 50, Milan are coming forward and Ismael Bennacer gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Marco Guida awards Hellas Verona a goal kick.
Federico Dimarco for Hellas Verona gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 50, Ball goes out of play for a Milan goal kick.
Marco Guida signals a Milan throw-in in Hellas Verona's half.
Hakan Calhanoglu for the home team is judged to be offside.
In the minute 53, Can Milan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Hellas Verona's half?
Throw-in for Hellas Verona at Giuseppe Meazza.
Marco Guida signals a free kick to Hellas Verona in their own half.
In the minute 54, Ismael Bennacer is booked for the home team.
In Milan Milan attack through Ante Rebic. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Milan.
In the minute 56, Marco Guida signals a Milan throw-in in Hellas Verona's half.
Marco Guida awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick Milan.
In the minute 58, Zlatan Ibrahimovic (Milan) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Milan have been awarded a corner by Marco Guida.
Hellas Verona have a goal kick.
In the minute 59, Milan awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Milan drive upfield and Hakan Calhanoglu gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Hellas Verona defender.
In the minute 60, Can Hellas Verona capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Milan's half?
Free kick for Milan in the half of Hellas Verona.
Zlatan Ibrahimovic (Milan) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 62, Milan to take a throw-in in Hellas Verona territory.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Pawel Dawidowicz for Hellas Verona who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Ivan Juric (Hellas Verona) has taken off Pawel Dawidowicz who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Adrien Tameze is the replacement.
Milan drives forward and Theo Hernandez gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Milan have been awarded a corner by Marco Guida.
In the minute 64, Ivan Juric (Hellas Verona) is making a second substitution, with Ebrima Colley replacing Nikola Kalinic.
In the minute 65, Milan have been given a penalty...
Marco Guida awards Milan a penalty but Zlatan Ibrahimovic misses from 12 yards.
Milan are pushing forward but Zlatan Ibrahimovic's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 66, Ball goes out of play for a Hellas Verona goal kick.
Milan's Zlatan Ibrahimovic gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Hellas Verona defender.
Corner awarded to Milan.
In the minute 67, Marco Guida signals a free kick to Hellas Verona in their own half.
The away team replace Ivan Ilic with Iyenoma Destiny Udogie.
Free kick for Milan in their own half.
In the minute 70, Milan surge into the attack at Giuseppe Meazza but Zlatan Ibrahimovicâ€™s header is off-target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Milan.
Free kick for Milan in their own half.
In the minute 73, Marco Guida signals a throw-in for Milan, close to Hellas Verona's area.
Mert Cetin is replacing Giangiacomo Magnani for the away team.
Can Milan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Hellas Verona's half?
In the minute 74, Hellas Verona awarded a free kick in their own half.
Milan awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Zlatan Ibrahimovic (Milan) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 76, Milan have been awarded a corner by Marco Guida.
Milan's Zlatan Ibrahimovic breaks free at Giuseppe Meazza. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Corner awarded to Milan.
In the minute 77, Rafael Leao (Milan) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Goal kick for Hellas Verona at Giuseppe Meazza.
Zlatan Ibrahimovic (Milan) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
In the minute 78, Corner awarded to Milan.
Milan's Zlatan Ibrahimovic gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Marco Guida awards Hellas Verona a goal kick.
In the minute 78, Stefano Pioli is making the team's second substitution at Giuseppe Meazza with Brahim Diaz replacing Rafael Leao.
Throw-in Milan.
Marco Guida signals a free kick to Hellas Verona in their own half.
In the minute 79, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Hellas Verona close to the penalty box.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Milan.
Hellas Verona awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 82, Ebrima Colley for Hellas Verona is whistled offside.
Milan have a dangerous throw-in.
Ball safe as Milan is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 84, Marco Guida signals a throw-in for Milan, close to Hellas Verona's area.
Throw-in for Hellas Verona in their own half.
Ebrima Colley (Hellas Verona) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
In the minute 85, Goal kick for Milan at Giuseppe Meazza.
Davide Calabria (Milan) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Important block from the Hellas Verona defence as Franck Kessie fires in a strike for Milan.
In the minute 87, Throw-in for Milan in the half of Hellas Verona.
The home team have replaced Hakan Calhanoglu with Jens Hauge. This is the third substitution made today by Stefano Pioli.
Milan drive upfield and Zlatan Ibrahimovic gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Hellas Verona defender.
In the minute 88, Free kick for Hellas Verona in their own half.
Marco Guida signals a free kick to Milan in their own half.
5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Milan.
Marco Guida signals a free kick to Hellas Verona.
Throw-in for Milan in the half of Hellas Verona.
Milan's Zlatan Ibrahimovic gets in a shot on goal at Giuseppe Meazza. But the effort is unsuccessful.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Davide Calabria of Milan smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Marco Guida signals a free kick to Hellas Verona in their own half.
In Milan Hellas Verona's Mattia Zaccagni is caught offside.
That's full-time at Giuseppe Meazza. The final score is 2-2.
Adrien Tameze (Hellas Verona) gets a yellow card.
Goal! Zlatan Ibrahimovic (Milan) levels the score at 2-2 with a header in Milan.
That's a fine assist from Brahim Diaz.
